trans-unit.source: Provides an image adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe de adaptador de imagem para o conjunto de adaptadores XHTML.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
trans-unit.target: Os adaptadores de controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace fornecem XHTML renderização e processamento de controles para dispositivos móveis em uma variedade de dispositivos de vídeo.

trans-unit.source: for verifying at load time that the class derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" /> has this permission.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar no tempo de carregamento de classe derivada de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" /> tenha essa permissão.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlImageAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlImageAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência fortemente tipada ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Renders the control and its content on the client using the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o controle e seu conteúdo no cliente usando o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Renders the image control on the client using the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o controle de imagem no cliente usando o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.
